actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to exempt certain transportation employees of private carriers of property by motor vehicle from the provisions of such act relating to maximum and overtime hours of labor.

summary.text: Exempts specified transportation employees of private carriers of property by motor vehicle from the provisions of the Walsh-Healey Act relating to maximum and overtime hours of labor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to exempt certain transportation employees of private carriers of property by motor vehicle from the provisions of such act relating to maximum and overtime hours of labor.
